introduction-p-1: Just a few steps from the beach, Aurora Apartment sits in the heart of Zukve — a peaceful seaside village where the rhythm of the waves and the scent of the sea define each day.
introduction-p-2: Our newly furnished appartment combines cozy Mediterranean style with every modern comfort. Enjoy air conditioning, TV channels, Wi-Fi, a fully equipped kitchen, and all the little details that make your stay easy and relaxing.
introduction-p-3: Our cozy, family-run accommodation invites you to slow down and feel at home. Whether you’re sharing breakfast on the terrace, strolling to the nearby cafés, or spending lazy afternoons by the water, everything here feels calm and genuine.
explore-p-1: Calm, clean and elegant, Aurora entice you to take time to relax and enjoy your vacations in a wonderful place, providing premium comfort and convenience.
explore-p-2: Fully equipped apartments that match your personal requirements, designed with high-end details to make your stay an unforgettable experience.
facilities-h2: Comforts that make you feel at home
facilities-p: Aurora Apartment in Zukve combines modern amenities with a warm, family atmosphere. It includes a private balcony, a fully equipped kitchenette, and a comfortable living area. Air-conditioning, free Wi-Fi, TV channels, and premium furnishings ensure your stay is easy and relaxing — all just a short walk from the beach.
parking-p: Private parking space available free of charge for our guests.
wifi-p: Stay connected during your holiday with free and reliable Wi-Fi throughout the property.
view-p: Enjoy the relaxing view of the Adriatic Sea right from your balcony or terrace.
family-p: Spacious and comfortable rooms that can host couples or families — perfect for a relaxing seaside stay.
linens-p: All apartments are supplied with clean bed linens and soft towels for your comfort.
barbecue-p: Relax in our private garden surrounded by greenery — perfect for family barbecues and peaceful evenings outdoors.

zukveDesc1: Zukve is the perfect spot for a relaxing family holiday — peaceful, safe, and just steps from the sea. And when you want a bit more to explore, you're perfectly placed between two amazing destinations.
zukveDesc2: The charming town of Nin is only a few minutes away, known for its sandy beaches and family-friendly atmosphere, while the vibrant city of Zadar is just a short drive from Zukve, offering fun day trips, beautiful sights, and unforgettable sunsets.
